short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Format and export ChatGPT conversations to PDF with customizable options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save ChatGPT Conversations to PDF

Effortlessly save your ChatGPT conversations as neatly formatted PDFs with this Chrome extension. Whether for work, study, or personal reference, our extension gives you complete control over how your saved conversations look.

Key Features:
- Flexible PDF Page Setup: Choose your preferred page size and orientation (portrait or landscape).
- Exclude Prompts: Focus on responses by excluding prompts from the final PDF.
- Adjustable Font Size: Customize text size to match your needs.
- Customizable Margins: Set your page margins for a polished and professional appearance.

Streamline your workflow and keep a clean record of your ChatGPT exchanges with just a few clicks. Download now and take control of your conversation exports!
